thread.title: EU and Britain to start trade talks

title: EU and Britain to start trade talks
text:
EU and Britain to start trade talks Sunday, April 15, 2018 - 01:35 
Britain and the European Union will start talks this week on their future trade relationship after Brexit. As Ciara Lee reports, with no substantial progress on the Irish border conundrum, negotiations could be challenging. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain and the European Union will start talks this week on their future trade relationship after Brexit. As Ciara Lee reports, with no substantial progress on the Irish border conundrum, negotiations could be challenging.
